DOC.brief_summary: Background : The wearable cardioverter defibrillator ( WCD ) establish treatment option patient high risk ventricular tachycardia / ventricular fibrillation ( VT/VF ) , either risk may temporarily present , patient high risk sudden cardiac death ( SCD ) VT/VF implantable cardioverter defibrillator ( ICD currently possible reason ( infection , recent MI < 40days , recent PCI/CABG < 3months etc. ) . Methods : Comprehensive registry include patient Austria receive WCD 2010-2016 .
DOC.detailed_description: Observational study describe WCD indication , event rate , inappropriate shock rate follow ( include ICD rate , shock rate , morbidity mortality ) Austrian WCD patient
